title: Sri Lanka Prime Minister Resigns
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa has tendered his resignation Media Minister Nalaka Gohahewa said as violence erupted in Colombo as his supporters clashed with police and the country was put under curfew.
Prim Minister Rajapaksa was under pressure to resign as inflation soared and the country faced energy shortages after two years of money printing.
Sri Lanka’s cabinet automatically dissolves after the Prime Minister resigns.
